debug.reload_languages.help: F3 + J = Recarregar idiomas (shift to cycle languages)
debug.reload_languages.switch.failure: Couldn't cycle languages. Switch to another language in the settings and try again
modmenu.summaryTranslation.languagereloa: Reduces load times and adds fallbacks for languages.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.languager: Makes language switching instant, introduces a search box and multi-selection in the language menu, adds debug features to cycle languages with Shift + F3 + J and to reload them with F3 + J.
